titles.title: My Soul Doth Magnify the Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
My soul does magnify the Lord
And my spirit rejoices in God, my Saviour
For He has regarded my helpless estate
He has done great things and holy is He
My soul does magnify the Lord
And my spirit rejoices in God, my Saviour
His mercy is on those who fear Him
He has done great things and holy is His name
